topic.title: persist-name()
topic.para: Description:If you receive the following error message during &abbrev; startup, set the persist-name() option of the duplicate drivers:
topic.synopsis: Error checking the uniqueness of the persist names, please override it with persist-name option. Shutting down.
topic.para: This error happens if you use identical drivers in multiple sources, for example, if you configure two file sources to read from the same file. In this case, set the persist-name() of the drivers to a custom string, for example, persist-name("example-persist-name1").
